message.raw:
reverted invoke_in_main to the version in changeset:b1dd4a1a1c45

Not sure why, but the most recent version seems to result in programs randomly segfaulting.
The version committed here leaks memory (very slowly) due to a PySide bug (see https://bugreports.qt-project.org/browse/PYSIDE-205 ) but at least it doesn't segfault.
